trans-unit.resname: CC2·1 | Liliana, Heretical Healer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Liliana, Heretical Healer
trans-unit.target: Liliana, Heretical Healer

trans-unit.resname: CC2·1 | Liliana, Heretical Healer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Lifelink
trans-unit.target: Lifelink

trans-unit.resname: CC2·1 | Liliana, Heretical Healer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile CARDNAME, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
trans-unit.target: Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile CARDNAME, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

trans-unit.resname: CC2·1 | Liliana, Defiant Necromancer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Liliana, Defiant Necromancer
trans-unit.target: Liliana, Defiant Necromancer

trans-unit.resname: CC2·1 | Liliana, Defiant Necromancer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+2]: Each player discards a card.
trans-unit.target: [+2]: Each player discards a card.

trans-unit.resname: CC2·1 | Liliana, Defiant Necromancer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−X]: Return target nonlegendary creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: [−X]: Return target nonlegendary creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: CC2·1 | Liliana, Defiant Necromancer | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−8]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature dies, return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step."
trans-unit.target: [−8]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature dies, return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step."

trans-unit.source: Ghoulcaller Gisa
trans-unit.target: Ghoulcaller Gisa

trans-unit.resname: CC2·2 | Ghoulcaller Gisa | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
trans-unit.target: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.

trans-unit.source: "Come now, dear brother. If you wanted rules, you should have called it a *game*, not a *war*."\n—Gisa, to Geralf
trans-unit.target: "Come now, dear brother. If you wanted rules, you should have called it a *game*, not a *war*."\n—Gisa, to Geralf

trans-unit.source: Ophiomancer
trans-unit.target: Ophiomancer

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each upkeep, if you control no Snakes, create a 1/1 black Snake creature token with deathtouch.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of each upkeep, if you control no Snakes, create a 1/1 black Snake creature token with deathtouch.

trans-unit.source: Her writhing, boneless movements are unsettling to humans, but hypnotic to her serpent brood.
trans-unit.target: Her writhing, boneless movements are unsettling to humans, but hypnotic to her serpent brood.

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Arena
trans-unit.target: Phyrexian Arena

trans-unit.resname: CC2·4 | Phyrexian Arena | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

trans-unit.source: A whisper of authority rises over a cacophony of grinding machines.
trans-unit.target: A whisper of authority rises over a cacophony of grinding machines.

trans-unit.source: Reanimate
trans-unit.target: Reanimate

trans-unit.source: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its mana value.
trans-unit.target: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its mana value.

trans-unit.source: "Death is a small price to pay for immortality."\n—Baron Sengir
trans-unit.target: "Death is a small price to pay for immortality."\n—Baron Sengir

trans-unit.source: Toxic Deluge
trans-unit.target: Toxic Deluge

trans-unit.resname: CC2·6 | Toxic Deluge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life.
trans-unit.target: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life.

trans-unit.resname: CC2·6 | Toxic Deluge | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: "I am greater than rain and nourishment. I am glistening oil and perfection."\n—Yawgmoth
trans-unit.target: "I am greater than rain and nourishment. I am glistening oil and perfection."\n—Yawgmoth

trans-unit.source: Sol Ring
trans-unit.target: Sol Ring

trans-unit.resname: CC2·7 | Sol Ring | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
trans-unit.target: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

trans-unit.source: Deep within the forsaken cavern, a new shadow emerged to devour the light.
trans-unit.target: Deep within the forsaken cavern, a new shadow emerged to devour the light.

trans-unit.source: Command Tower
trans-unit.target: Command Tower

trans-unit.resname: CC2·8 | Command Tower | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
trans-unit.target: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

trans-unit.source: "It's a bit much, I know, but it reminds my visitors who really holds the power here."\n—Davriel Cane
trans-unit.target: "It's a bit much, I know, but it reminds my visitors who really holds the power here."\n—Davriel Cane
